comment: I took this one on-line. We had little contact with the professor which was a surprise as she is very passionate about her subject. Feedback on assignments was non-existent. Tests were not available when scheduled & covered material from later chapters. There were multiple group assignments one which was worth a significant part of the final grade.
Not a very organized teacher.  She was not very helpful in an online class that was full of mistakes.  I would not recommend taking a class from her.
She is very passionate about marketing.  Her test content is always outside the range of what the syllabus states.  ALWAYS review one chapter before and one chapter after the given test range.

Okay professor, her teaching just didnt match my learning style. All test/quizes are online but they are difficult, just READ all the chapters in advance, group project is a marketing plan,fairly easy but she picks your group,overall just an "okay" class
